DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of MP-513 on 24-h glycemic control in patients with type 2 Diabetes for 4 weeks administration.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Study of MP-513 With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
